name: DATAHIT
description:
Blend In. Find Target. Terminate. Repeat.

DATAHIT is a game taking place in a dystopian near-future in which a governmental database holding information concerning every person in the country, including location, name, age, fingerprint, residence, job - was hacked by a super-corporation and is now sold to the highest bidder. One of those bidders is SERIAL - a Human Termination Agency.

You play as one of the agents, strolling around the busy downtown, trying to blend in, find your target using clues from the database, and discreetly terminate them.

Special Thanks to Stan Erbrink for the sound effects and music!

The game randomly generates NPC names. All characters appearing in this work are fictitious. Any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental.
